name: The Journey of Ra
description:
During the day, Ra sails across the sky to shine the light of the sun across Egypt. At night, Bastet must defend him as he sails through the 12 gates of the 'Duat', the ancient Egyptian underworld. Fight through armies of fire-breathing multi-headed snakes and defeat the abominable Apophis, god of chaos and destruction, to ensure that the sun would rise once again.

Game Designer and Programmer: Zeyad Elbadrawy
Art Designer: Meral Helmy

This game is based on Ancient Egyptian Legends by renowned Egyptologist, Margaret Murray (published in 1913) and brought to life by two Egyptian game developers as part of the Historically Accurate Game Jam 4.
